library(ggplot2)
```

# Show current date-time
Sys.time()
```

```{r}
# Scatter plot: Price vs Carat, colored by Cut
ggplot(diamonds, aes(carat, price, color = cut)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2, size = 0.6) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::label_dollar()) +
  labs(
    title = "ggplot2 diamonds: Price vs Carat",
    subtitle = paste("Rendered at", format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z")),
    x = "Carat",
    y = "Price (USD)",
    color = "Cut"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 12)
```
